channel.title: Helios
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/9156/helios2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/303bm0l.png[/img]Webclient: [url=http://heliosrsps.com/play/]Helios RSPS[/url] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img]Forums:[url=http://heliosrsps.com/forums/forum.php]Helios[/url]
Helios, which seems to be turning into a lovely community and which is growing larger and larger by the day is a unique server like no other. What separates Helios from the rest is that we have unique content in which other servers do not. We pride ourselves on bringing you a bug free game play and constant daily updates, we are also trying our best to create long term game play that you can play hours on end. Although Helios hasn't been around very long it is starting to look very promising. Helios has had a lot of positive comments from new/old players in the last few weeks and we have taken that information and we are working on some great new content. Helios is a stable base that is based on the revision 667 and we plan on merging into the revision 718 in the next few days.
[IMG]http://tinyurl.com/d23pob3[/img]
[B][SIZE=3]Features[/SIZE][/B]
Minigames - Castle Wars
- Clan Wars
- Fight Pits
- Barrows
- Fight Cave
- Duel Arena
- God Wars(Arma, Bandos, Nex, Zammy, Sara)
- Dominion tower
Quests - Lost City
- Fishing
- Cooking
- Slayer
- Summoning
- Thieving
- Smihing
- Mining
- Woodcutting
- Crafting
- Fletching
- Herblore
- Firemaking
- Agility(I'll be re-doing this.)
- Hunter
Bosses
- Corporeal beast
- King Black Dragon
- Kalphite Queen
- Tormented Demon
- Strykewyrm
- A lot more, i can't remember atm.
- Notes
- Ancient Effigies (Not fully done yet)
- Skill cape customization.
- Dicing
- Trading
- Graves on death
- Bank
- Auras
- Perfect combat
-Stronghold security dungeon
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/51ooc9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/t96pn9.png[/img] We provide lovely new training spots, and a lot of them. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuKCnh.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mSdPeh.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2hwo93c.png[/img] Which are unlocked by gaining total levels. [IMG]http://gyazo.com/eaf4ef6b6d5cd75dd9527d5918bbcde6.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/708d3cac34ccf87ace0951b9e0a3d7b8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/kedquf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gIHxsh.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CrLG6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GCOuYh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/BXbwrO.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/34ovp0g.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/s6he2u.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/28l9oiv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/15mmffa.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/33vmglx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2hf3yq0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7VqXL.png[/img]
To sum up this advertisement I would like to include that we love and need suggestions so that we can have constant updates, so register on the forums guys! Have fun and see you ingame! [/CENTER]

item.title: Helios

@kingcobra805 wrote:

[CENTER]

Webclient: Helios RSPS
Forums:Helios

Helios, which seems to be turning into a lovely community and which is growing larger and larger by the day is a unique server like no other. What separates Helios from the rest is that we have unique content in which other servers do not. We pride ourselves on bringing you a bug free game play and constant daily updates, we are also trying our best to create long term game play that you can play hours on end. Although Helios hasn’t been around very long it is starting to look very promising. Helios has had a lot of positive comments from new/old players in the last few weeks and we have taken that information and we are working on some great new content. Helios is a stable base that is based on the revision 667 and we plan on merging into the revision 718 in the next few days.

[SIZE=3]Features[/SIZE]

Minigames

  • Castle Wars

  • Clan Wars

  • Fight Pits

  • Barrows

  • A lot more, i can’t remember atm.

  • Notes

  • Skill cape customization.

  • Dicing

  • Trading

  • Bank

-Stronghold security dungeon



We provide lovely new training spots, and a lot of them.
